languages.text: "Мои миссии не всегда заканчиваются удачей. Увы". {n}Хейнрикс буравит вас взглядом еще несколько секунд, а затем отводит его.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мои миссии не всегда заканчиваются удачей. Увы". {n}Хейнрикс буравит вас взглядом еще несколько секунд, а затем отводит его.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "My missions do not always end in success. Unfortunately." {n}Heinrix's piercing gaze rests on you for several seconds, and then he looks away.{/n}

languages.text: “我无法保证任务总会顺利完成，这确实很遗憾。”{n}海因里希以刺骨的目光盯着你看了几秒钟，之后移开了视线。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My missions do not always end in success. Unfortunately." {n}Heinrix's piercing gaze rests on you for several seconds, and then he looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我无法保证任务总会顺利完成，这确实很遗憾。”{n}海因里希以刺骨的目光盯着你看了几秒钟，之后移开了视线。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Lamentablemente, no todas mis misiones terminan con el éxito». {n}La penetrante mirada de Heinrix se posa sobre ti durante varios segundos y luego la aparta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My missions do not always end in success. Unfortunately." {n}Heinrix's piercing gaze rests on you for several seconds, and then he looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lamentablemente, no todas mis misiones terminan con el éxito». {n}La penetrante mirada de Heinrix se posa sobre ti durante varios segundos y luego la aparta.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「我が任務は必ずしも成功に終わるとは限らない。残念ながら」{n}ハインリックスは鋭い視線を数秒間あなたに注いだ後、視線を逸らした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My missions do not always end in success. Unfortunately." {n}Heinrix's piercing gaze rests on you for several seconds, and then he looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我が任務は必ずしも成功に終わるとは限らない。残念ながら」{n}ハインリックスは鋭い視線を数秒間あなたに注いだ後、視線を逸らした。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Mes missions ne peuvent pas être toujours couronnées de succès, malheureusement. » {n}Le regard perçant d'Heinrix reste fixé sur vous pendant quelques secondes, puis il se détourne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My missions do not always end in success. Unfortunately." {n}Heinrix's piercing gaze rests on you for several seconds, and then he looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mes missions ne peuvent pas être toujours couronnées de succès, malheureusement. » {n}Le regard perçant d'Heinrix reste fixé sur vous pendant quelques secondes, puis il se détourne.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Meine Missionen enden nicht immer erfolgreich. Leider." {n}Heinrix' durchbohrender Blick verweilt eine Weile auf dir, bis er von dir ablässt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My missions do not always end in success. Unfortunately." {n}Heinrix's piercing gaze rests on you for several seconds, and then he looks away.{/n}

languages.text: "Misyonlarım, her daim başarıyla sonuçlanmaz. Ne yazık ki..." {n}Heinrix'in delici bakışları, saniyeler boyunca üzerinde dolanıyor. Ardından uzaklara dalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My missions do not always end in success. Unfortunately." {n}Heinrix's piercing gaze rests on you for several seconds, and then he looks away.{/n}
